body.p:
Louisville Ky June 15th 1861
His Excellency
B Magoffin

The undersigned petitioner would state that at the January Term 1861 of the City Court of Louisville a fine of one hundred Dollars was imposed upon him by said Court Court, as it was alledged for Committing an assault upon one Elizabeth Sidle
Now your petitioner would state that he never did commit an assault upon Said Sidle in his life,

He says that all he done was that this, that said Sidle came into his house one day, and commenced abusing petitioners wife, that she Scand^alized^ petitioners wife, who called to petitioner to get her to go away, that petitioner done all he could to get said Sidle to leave and not abuse his wife, and failing in that, he only put her out of the Door and closed it after her,

He Says Said Sidle was the only witness in the case who professed to know anything about the Matter and that through Malice she was determined to Vent her spite upon Deft for putting her out of the house, Deft Most Solemly vows that he never did assault her and in view of all the facts of the case he asks your Excellency to remit said fine

The undersigned Citizens of Louisville state that, they are acquainted with the within petitioner said Forst, that they know him to be a man of truth and a Law abiding Citizen, that they believe the statements of the within petition are true, that they believe his is a case that calls for Executive Clemency and unite with him in asking your Excellency to remit said fine

John. W Allen
W. S Ward
F. B Jones
M R Hydes M C C D
James Thomas
Jno M. Farrar
Sturgis Frankil
Isadore Granman
tho Reaugh
Day Watchman 4th ward
W. C. Price
John C. Felix
Jas Harris
A H McKay
J R Greene
H C Russell Dr
H. S. Johnston D. M
Jacob Leiff
Joel R Holest
F. W. Quast
S W Brown
James Curran
Michael Nolan
Capt John. Metcalf

Mr Forst is a verry quiet orderly citizen & his statements are entitled to full credit. The woman Sidle was the only witness in the case, she is a german Servant woman & in giving her Testimony Evinced much bitterness towards Forst
Do me the favour to introduce the bearer of this Mr D Forst to the Govr and aid him in the Matter Mr Forst is a friend of mine and I recommend him to you as a Gentleman Every way reliable

Louisville City Ct
$100. } Assault
D. Forst
